channel.title: Doom
channel.description:
Anyone else buy it? It looks like a pretty good change of pace for the standard shooter, for a long time now the goals have usually been duck and cover but ID seems to be stressing that this game is more about constant movement.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RO90omga8D4
